title: Patton Has an Intervention!
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about the cinnamon challenge, Will Smith turning down The Matrix, and the levels of pole dancing.

Have something interesting you want to share with us? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com or leave us a voice message at speak pipe.com/didyougetmytext.
